description:

comments.content: There's not enough data here to debug, and the test is no longer running to get additional data.  The likelihood of fixing this seems low right now since effort is on cells v2.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alaski

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/287830
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=83c1fa6c03a61580212241d566b4bc04c29fe776
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 83c1fa6c03a61580212241d566b4bc04c29fe776
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Mar 3 09:29:30 2016 -0500

    Enable rebuild tests in cellsv1 job
    
    Change 022802997c10fc4ed56b1e1875cd7ccb16cc0688 fixed evacuate/rebuild
    in the cells API so enable the rebuild-related tests we were skipping
    before.
    
    Related-Bug: #1445629
    Related-Bug: #1445631
    Related-Bug: #1552046
    
    Change-Id: I15f867d8c6ff280bc68a6abf8b0da6e970c2bb39
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
